long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flappy Basketball combines the thrill of basketball with the addictive gameplay of the classic Flappy Bird. In this game, players control a basketball as it soars through the air, navigating past obstacles and hoops to score points. With simple one-touch controls, players must tap the screen to keep the basketball airborne and guide it through the narrow openings between moving obstacles and hoops. The challenge lies in timing the taps just right to avoid collisions and rack up points. With vibrant graphics and upbeat music, Flappy  Basketball delivers a fun and engaging experience that will keep players coming back for more. Test your skills, aim for high scores, and become the ultimate basketball flappy champion!
